page.title: 06Employment In Newburgh Area
page.content: There is a limited number of jobs available in this area.These include the transport company of TNT,hotel work at the local Hotels,The Ythan and The Udny Arms.There are only two shops in this area which provide some work for the local people such as a shop assistant or for younger people delivering newspapers. The biggest source of employment here must be farming.Just about all the surrounding land is taken up by farming which provides jobs for local people. Because Newburgh has a limited number of jobs about three fifths of the population don't work here but commute to Aberdeen,Peterhead or Ellon.Also a few of the local people travel to the North Sea to work with the oil industry.
